data.eml:eml: Three new species of the Tropidurus spinulosus group (Squamata: Tropiduridae) from Eastern Paraguay

This dataset contains the digitized treatments in Plazi based on the original journal article André Luiz G. Carvalho (2016): Three new species of the Tropidurus spinulosus group (Squamata: Tropiduridae) from Eastern Paraguay. American Museum Novitates 3853: 1-44, DOI: 10.5281/zenodo.270030, Hdl: http://hdl.handle.net/2246/6638
